1   DEVELOPMENTAL PEDIATRICS  
(Pediatría del Desarrollo)  
Children’s Hospital of T he King’s Daughters, Inc.  
400 Gresham Drive, Suite 900 , Norfolk, VA 23507  
Tel: (757) 668- 7473 / FAX: (757) 668- 7474  
 
NEW PATIENT COMPREHENSIVE HISTORY FORM  
(Formulario del Historia l Completo para Nuevo Paciente)  
 
Please carefully read & complete all sections of this form.  (Favor  lea cuidadosamente y complete todas  las secciones de este documento ).

PLEASE LIST ANY UNUSUAL AND /OR TRAUMATIC F AMILY EVENT IN YOUR CHILD ’S LIFE WHICH YOU FEEL MAY HAVE AFFECTED 
HIM/HER: (Examples: birth of a sibling, death in the family, divorce, illnesses, frequent school changes, abuse)

AFECTADO: (Ejemplos: Nacimiento de un hermano(a), muerte en la familia; divorcio; enfermedades; cambio frecuente de escuela, abuso))

BEHAVIORS OF CONCERN:   (COMPORTAMIENTOS QUE LE PREOCUPAN)

skills

PEER RELATIONSHIPS & SOCIAL SKILLS : (RELACIONES CON SUS SEMEJANTES Y DESTR EZAS SOCIALES ) 
 
Is your child sought by peers for friendship?    □ Yes (Sí)  □ No

Does your child have trouble making or keeping friends?  □ Yes (Sí)  □ No    If yes, please explain:

DEVELOPMENTAL MILESTONES  (LOGROS EN EL DESARROLLO)  
 
***PLEASE INDICATE THE APPROXIMATE AGE WHEN YOUR CHILD WAS CONSISTENTLY  ABLE TO DO THE FOLLOWING:

(indicate age in months or years)  (indique la edad en meses o en años)  AGE  
(EDAD)

(Se volteó solo(a))                                                        ___ months

         (años)
